metadata.Title: CVE-2021-3671 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - low.
metadata.Description: A null pointer de-reference was found in the way samba kerberos server handled missing sname in TGS-REQ (Ticket Granting Server - Request). An authenticated user could use this flaw to crash the samba server.

notes.Note: mdeslaur> same as CVE-2021-37750 for MIT krb5

criterions.comment: heimdal: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
samba: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
